subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: The host of the World Twenty20 cricket championship is the first tournament host to reach the final four, and will meet Pakistan in Colombo on Thursday to play for a place in the final on Sunday.
snippet: The host of the World Twenty20 cricket championship is the first tournament host to reach the final four, and will meet Pakistan in Colombo on Thursday to play for a place in the final on Sunday.
